text: Avanutaiya anumati perra (vana)varkalait tavira marravarkal avanitattil parintu pecuvatum payanalikkatu. (Allahvutaiya oru kattalai pirakkum camayattil avarkal payantu natunkukinranar.) Avarkalutaiya ullattil iruntu natukkam ninkiyatum (avarkalil oruvar marravarkalai nokki) ‘‘unkal iraivan enna kattalaiyittan?'' Enru ketparkal. Atarku marravarkal ‘‘ (itaventiya) niyayamana kattalaiyaiye ittan; avano mikka melanavan, mikap periyavan avan'' enru kuruvarkal
